movies.title: Barbie: A Magical Adventure
movies.plot: Join Barbie and her friends on a magical adventure as they embark on a quest to save their enchanted kingdom from a powerful sorcerer.

movies.title: Student of the Year
movies.actors: Sidharth Malhotra, Varun Dhawan, Alia Bhatt, Rishi Kapoor
movies.plot: Three college friends navigate love, friendship, and competition to win the 'Student of the Year' trophy.

movies.title: Aashiqui 2
movies.plot: A successful musician falls in love with a young aspiring singer, but their love faces numerous challenges and tests.

movies.title: KGF: Chapter 1
movies.plot: A young man rises to power in the world of gold mining and becomes a ruthless underworld figure in the process.

movies.title: Sanam Teri Kasam
movies.plot: A touching love story between a troubled musician and a sheltered librarian, who find solace in each other's company despite societal pressures.

movies.title: ABCD: Any Body Can Dance
movies.actors: Prabhudheva, Ganesh Acharya, Kay Kay Menon
movies.plot: A talented but arrogant dancer faces challenges and redemption when he joins a group of street dancers to compete in a dance competition.

movies.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
movies.actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Amrish Puri, Anupam Kher
movies.plot: A classic love story of a young man and woman who meet and fall in love during a trip to Europe but face challenges due to family traditions.

movies.title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
movies.actors: Salman Khan, Harshaali Malhotra, Nawazuddin Siddiqui
movies.plot: A man with a big heart embarks on a journey to reunite a mute, lost Pakistani girl with her family in India, overcoming obstacles and fostering cross-border friendship.

movies.title: Fashion
movies.actors: Priyanka Chopra, Kangana Ranaut, Mugdha Godse
movies.plot: A young woman from a small town aspires to become a successful fashion model in the glamorous but cutthroat world of the fashion industry.
